description: The contract requires a consultant to conduct an engineering survey and provide a detailed design for the replacement of the 70KVA UPS system and existing heat pumps within Fleet Maintenance Facilities (FMF) Cape Scott at Naval Electronic Systems Test Range Atlantic (NESTRA)". ...,
full_summary:
### Osborne Head - NESTRA UPS and Heat Pump Replacement
**Reference**: WS4098325357

**Status**: This tender has expired.

**Purpose**: Public Services and Procurement Canada intends to establish a consultant contract for the design and implementation of a replacement for the 70KVA UPS system and existing heat pumps at Fleet Maintenance Facilities (FMF) Cape Scott, Naval Electronic Systems Test Range Atlantic (NESTRA), Osborne Head, Building OH301 and OH313, Dartmouth, Nova Scotia.

**Scope of Work**
The consultant will provide detailed engineering survey and design services for the replacement of the UPS and heat pumps, along with associated electrical and mechanical infrastructure modifications. 

**Notice**
This is a request for proposals (RFP) under the Supply Arrangement E0225-150564 for Mechanical and Electrical Engineering Services.

**Ineligible Firms**
The eligible firms are:
- Peerless Consulting Ltd.
- Eastpoint Engineering Limited
- Strum Engineering Associates Ltd.
- SNC-Lavalin Inc.

**Contact Information**
Carlos Castillo Nieto
Ministère des Travaux publics et des Services gouvernementaux (SPAC)
11, rue Laurier, Phase III, Place du Portage
Gatineau, Québec
Canada, K1A 0S5
carlos.castillonieto@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

This tender announcement is for a competitive procurement for a consultant contract for a detailed engineering survey and design to replace the UPS and heat pumps in Fleet Maintenance Facilities (FMF) Cape Scott, Naval Electronic Systems Test Range Atlantic (NESTRA). This work is to be carried out under the guidelines of the Supply Arrangement E0225-150564 for Mechanical and Electrical Engineering Services in the province of Nova Scotia.
Only four firms qualified under the Electrical discipline and are invited to bid.

Common services required in government tenders
Some common services that you will often encounter in government tenders are:
- Non-Destructive Testing
- Mechanical Engineering
- Electrical Engineering
- Civil Engineering
- Project Management
. It is a good idea to make sure you familiarize yourself with all of the different services that the goverment does contract.  But this is a different help page than the Engineering professions. Read on for list of detailed lists. Information on Government Contract Procurement.

**How to Get Involved**

The bid was open for the time period of August 1, 2023 - September 8, 2023.
